content: Could I have eyes on this PR? It's a step towards letting typeclass inference know that frames are heyting algebras.

In particular, I would like to know what people think of this comment: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/12731#discussion_r1592889385
It seemingly is a spread notation bug, but I haven't minimised yet.
The very eventual goal is to make LinearOrder extend ByheytingAlgebra, but that will take quite a bit longer to land
:ping_pong:
